channel.title: Modify Watches: New Products - Cal
channel.description: A list of the new products at Modify Watches.

item.title: Oski in Orchid
item.description:
The 'Oski in Orchid' comes with one Oski watch face and one Orchid strap. The watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match faces and straps of all styles from your Modify collection. The strap is made from a soft and comfortable silicone material and the face is made from a scratch-resist..

Price: $50.00
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Oski & Pac-12 Set
item.description:
This set includes the limited-edition Oski face, limited-edition Pac-12 face and three matching straps. It includes the Oski face, navy blue strap and yellow strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

Price: $110.00
item.content:encoded:
This set includes the limited-edition Oski face, limited-edition Pac-12 face and three matching straps. It includes the Oski face, navy blue strap and yellow strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

Price: $110.00

item.title: Oski Set with Navy Blue & Yellow
item.description:
This set includes the limited-edition Oski face and two matching straps. It includes the Oski face, navy blue strap and yellow strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

Price: $65.00
